amendment.description: Amendment makes states eligible to receive Alcohol-Impaired Countermeasures grant funds to cover the cost of DWI vehicle impoundment programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in part B of House Report 108-456 to make state Driving While Intoxicated (DWI) vehicle impoundment programs eligiblefor existing alcohol-impaired countermeasures grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. LoBiondo.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LoBiondo amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
